Class Draw

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
        • modal.Draw
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, Draw_IF

    public class Draw
extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
implements Draw_IF
    Class extends Canvas and allows items to be drawn onto it
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    markus
